Name: Blades of Gory
About the game: Blades of Gory is a 2D versus fighting game that is easy to learn and hard to master. Choose from 8 fierce warriors. 4 game modes. Arcade: Defeat all 8 playable characters before facing 4 epic boss fights. Earn extra credits by winning two rounds in a row or by having a perfect round. Versus: Fight against the computer or a friend in a one off couch versus fight. Sudden Death: One hit is all it takes! Win 5 rounds for victory! 3 on 3: Select your 3 warriors and 3 opponents. Tag in and out your warriors until your opponents are all slain! A unique combat system that rewards timing, accurate blocking and mastery of range. 3 attacks. 3 blocks. 2 taunts. Move left. Move right. XBOX 360 Gamepad recommended. Keyboard controls available.
